Benefits
Why should I get vaccinated if I might get COVID-19 anyway?
COVID-19 vaccines help prevent disease, hospitalization, and death. Unvaccinated people are
more likely
to get COVID-19 and much more likely to be hospitalized and to die from COVID-19, compared to people who are
up to date
with their COVID-19 vaccinations.
